content:
BREAKING: Fed says they are no longer forecasting a
recession.

The Fed went from "needing a recession to lower inflation" to "no
longer forecasting a recession" in under a year.
author: crt

content:
To se mi bere kot om gredo še gor oz ne mislimo jih spuščati v
bližnji prihodnosti?
author: hostamox

content: Vse bo dražje, ampak nič skrbet.
author: sbisbi

content:
[sbisbi]
Vse bo dražje, ampak nič skrbet.
Tesle bodo spet cenejše, pravi Musk, da bo ob vsakem zvišanju
obresti znižal ustrezno cene avtomobilov. Lep dan.
author: bigl
